snippet: GENATT--Leslie. Age 81, passed away on March 12, 2016. Most cherished husband of Judith, most spectacular father of Michael and Jodi, and Richard and Colleen and most adored grandfather of Zach, Jamie, Alex and Allie. Best lifelong friend to Steve and Arlene Genatt and Rob and Lynne Schwartz. Past President of Engineers Country Club and Club Champion several times. Founder, CEO and a Legend in the Insurance Business. Les, you gave us all a great life and more love than we could ever ask for. Love and miss you so much already. Funeral services Tuesday, March 15 at 10am at Guttermans Funeral Chapel in Woodbury, NY, 8000 Jericho Turnpike. 1/3

Founder, CEO and a Legend in the Insurance Business. Les, you gave us all a great life and more love than we could ever ask for. Love and miss you so much already. Funeral services Tuesday, March 15 at 10am at Guttermans Funeral Chapel in Woodbury, NY, 8000 Jericho Turnpike. 1/3
